snippet: In “Mr. X: A Vision of Leos Carax,” Tessa Louise-Salomé turns a documentary eye on a French filmmaker.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews documentary film Mr X: A Vision of Leos Carax, directed by Tessa Louise-Salome.
lead_paragraph: In “Mr. X: A Vision of Leos Carax,” Tessa Louise-Salomé turns a documentary eye on a French filmmaker.

headline.seo: ‘Mr. X: A Vision of Leos Carax’ Burnishes a Cinematic Myth
headline.main: Behind the Enigma of a Cult-Favorite Film Auteur
